section.title: XML Source Editor
section.para: You can use this editor to edit the Smooks configuration file directly.

section.title: Error Messages GUI
section.para: If the Smooks tools can't understand the configuration file or the configuration file is illegal (XML structure isn't right for Smooks configuration file, etc.), The error message panel will be displayed above the XML editor.

note.title: Tip
note.para: When the error message panel is displayed, other editors ( Graphical Editor, Configuration Editor ) are disabled.
You can't edit the configuration file with other editors until file becomes valid.
